page.title: 09Health in New Milton
page.content:
{ New Milton}and{Ashley}is an area popular for retirement.With a large number of senior citizens ( about 30% of the population are over 65) there has been a noticeable increase in the number of nursing and rest homes.{ { { New Milton Health Centre}was opened in 1971.There are two group practices with eight doctors and the centre also provides nursing care,chiropody, psychiatric care speech and hearing theraphy.Between 250 and 300 patients visit the centre every day and over half are senior citizens,many also are suffering from arthritus.
{ Ashley Lodge Nursing Home}is one of 19 nursing homes in our D_Block. They look after 28 old people,the oldest being Mrs Noble who is 99 years old.
